data.title: Buy Washington Nationals tickets (MLB
data.meta_description: Buy Washington Nationals Tickets, Seating Charts for MLB games (Baseball) | TicketSmarter
data.text:
Washington Nationals Baseball Tickets

Wave the flag of fandom high when you purchase Washington Nationals tickets from TicketSmarter. The Washington Nationals started Major League Baseball play in 2005 after the Montreal Expos were relocated to Washington, D.C. The team shares the history and statistical data of the Montreal Expos, which dates back to their first season in 1969. The Nationals are the eighth MLB franchise to be located in Washington D.C.

The team saw tremendous success in the 2010s with National League East Division titles in 2012, 2014, 2016 and 2017. They went on to win the National League pennant and the World Series in 2019. The team originally shared RFK Stadium with D.C. United and the Howard Bison football team, but relocated to the newly-built Nationals Park in 2008. Buy your Washington Nationals tickets and put on your red, white and blue for a great day at the ballpark!

Washington Nationals Ticket Prices

There are many variables that can alter the Nats ticket prices for Nationals games. The win-loss record of the team, the strength of the opponent, the number of games left in the season, the league standings and seating location are all factors that can affect the price of Nats tickets.

How much are Washington Nationals tickets?

Tickets for Washington Nationals baseball games are affordable for the whole family with Nats tickets starting as cheap as $10 to $15. After winning the World Series, the average price for tickets rose to around $50. Games against teams high up in the league standings or against NL East divisional rivals will usually have more expensive tickets. Whether you are looking for a cheap ticket in the upper infield gallery or VIP seating in the Delta Sky360 Club, TicketSmarter has the selection of inventory online. The club seating prices can exceed $350 per ticket since they have all-inclusive amenities in many cases including food and beverages.

Washington Nationals tickets for this season can generally be found in a price range between $3.53 and $9278.07, while the average price of 2024 Washington Nationals tickets is around $152.64. The Washington Nationals at Baltimore Orioles game at Oriole Park at Camden Yards, 333 West Camden Street, Baltimore, MD is next up for the Washington Nationals. The game will take place on 8/13/2024 6:35PM and there is 576 tickets available on TicketSmarter. Cheap Washington Nationals at Baltimore Orioles tickets will start at $9.90, while the most expensive seats in the ballpark will cost $179.10.

Washington Nationals Dates & Schedule

The Nats play a total of 162 games during the MLB regular season. Half of these games are played at Nationals Park while the other half are away games that will see the Nationals play on the road. Their most common opponents are fellow members of the National League East, which include the Atlanta Braves, Miami Marlins, Philadelphia Phillies and the New York Mets. During spring the Washington Nationals play Spring Training games at FITTEAM Ballpark in West Palm Beach, Florida as a part of the Grapefruit League.

Fans of the Nationals can buy tickets for all home and away games during spring training, the regular season and the MLB postseason.

There are 93 games left on the Washington Nationals schedule in 2024. Fans are already making their plans to be at Nationals Park, 1500 South Capitol St., Washington, DC on September 28th, 2025 at 12:00am for the Chicago White Sox at Washington Nationals game. There are 14 ticket options for the game available on TicketSmarter in the price range of $118.80 to $148.50.

When do Washington Nationals tickets go on sale?

Tickets for the upcoming MLB season will start going on sale sometime between December and February. Season tickets and single-game tickets will both be available during this time frame. More tickets will be listed on TicketSmarter as the season draws closer.

Washington Nationals Seating Chart

Nationals Park is one of the most recent stadiums built for Major League Baseball competition. It was built in 2008 and can hold a seated capacity of 41,339 fans. The stadium features four levels of seating looking over the infield area with additional seating located in the outfield. It has multiple pricing zones that can fit any budget for upcoming games.

Need help picking out a seat at Nationals Park? TicketSmarter offers an interactive seating map that creates a virtual Nats ticket office experience. Click on any upcoming game and a highly-detailed seating chart will display each section with tickets available. Fans can also sort the ticket options by price, section and row.

Safe and Secure Washington Nationals Ticket Purchasing

TicketSmarter provides baseball fans with a safe and secure web platform for buying Washington Nationals tickets online. We use the highest standards in the ticketing industry to ensure your personal information remains protected during all ticket transactions. You can skip the Nationals box office lines at the ballpark and buy legitimate Nats tickets ahead of time at TicketSmarter.

100% Washington Nationals Ticket Guarantee

All TicketSmarter tickets are 100% guaranteed. Verified customers rate TicketSmarter 4.6/5.0 stars, so you can order with confidence knowing that we stand behind you throughout your Nats ticket buying experience.
